body.p:
Nicholasville Ky
May 15th 1862
His Excellency
B. Magoffin
Governor of
Ky.
Sir --

Permit ^me^ to introduce to you my friend James L. Buskett. He is the bearer of a Petition praying the remission of a fine imposed upon R L. Carlise at the March Term of our Circuit Court. Mr Carlile is a gentleman every way worthy of confidence, and the same I take pleasure in saying of my friend.
